activities:
Noderabbit, Inc., dba Appsembler, provides hosting of Open edX courses on Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, and other third-party hosting services. While signing up and using courses students may give identifying information, such as name, email and other information. Some Appsembler clients may charge a fee for courses and payment information will be stored; full credit card numbers will not be stored. And student actions in the course -- such as which courses they took and how they performed on quizzes and tests -- will be tracked and stored. 

Individual students data related to courses may be accessed by the instructors and the sponsoring organizations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Marketing data is collected about site visitors that have cookies enabled. Course student data is collected by the online courses of our clients which we host. Student data may include name, email, information about the courses they took and their performance in the courses. We store this data and our clients can access it on the servers.
